word_mean: 慢性的，痼疾的，绵延难治的，长期形成的

sentence.Network_en: I am sometimes accused of being an inveterate poseur.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时有人说我惯于装模作样。

sentence.Network_en: It is hard for an inveterate smoker to give up tobacco.
sentence.Network_cn: 要一位有多年烟瘾的烟民戒烟是困难的。

sentence.Network_en: It was a sorely needed lesson because I had an inveterate arguer.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是个独一无二的重要的教训,我原来是个固执,拗强的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... veteran 老兵 inveterate 根深蒂固的 itiate 污染；使堕落.
蓝宝词典 ... inveigle v. 诱骗，诱使 inveterate adj. 根深的，成癖的，积习的 invidious adj. 容易引起不满的,招人嫉妒的.
蓝宝词典 ... inveigle v. 诱骗，诱使 inveterate adj. 根深的，成癖的，积习的 invidious adj. 容易引起不满的,招人嫉妒的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... commiserate 同情，怜悯 inveterate 积习已深的 iterate 重做，反复重申.

list.abs: Marcovaldo the irrepressible dreamer , Marcovaldo the inveterate schemer ., 天生的梦想家马可瓦多 , 智多星马可瓦多.
An inveterate interrupter of other people ' s conversations ., 一个习惯打断别人谈话的人.
an inveterate seer of sights ., 锲而不舍的名胜观光者.
It is hard for an inveterate smoker to give up tobacco / cigarette ., 要一个上瘾的吸烟者戒掉吸烟是困难的.
可可网络课堂:《新概念英语第三册》Lesson&nbsp... ... Inveterate liar 积习难改的撒谎者 Inveterate hatred 积怨 Incurable 顽症.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (referring to disease, in the sense 'of long standing, chronic'): from Latin inveteratus 'made old', past participle of inveterare (based on vetus, veter- 'old')

entry.tran: 积习不改的;上瘾的;根深蒂固的
entry.def: If you describe someone as, for example, an inveterate liar or smoker, you mean that they have lied or smoked for a long time and are not likely to stop doing it.

means.word_mean: 1. having a habit of long standing;

auth_sentence.content: In the case of Inveterate Gambler Ping, success drew attention.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the case of Inveterate Gambler Ping, success drew attention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the case of Inveterate Gambler Ping, success drew attention.

auth_sentence.content: Outwardly he is scarred, sarcastic and callous an inveterate brawler.
auth_sentence.res_content: Outwardly he is scarred, sarcastic and callous an inveterate brawler.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Outwardly he is scarred, sarcastic and callous an inveterate brawler.

auth_sentence.content: He is also an inveterate, and not always tactful, prankster.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is also an inveterate, and not always tactful, prankster.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is also an inveterate, and not always tactful, prankster.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或地位等"; 2. 表形容词,"具有……的"; 3. 表动词,"做,造成;使"

in进+ate具有……的→innate与出生一起进来→天赋的
in进入+veter老+ate具有……的→使成为老的
